title: Roger Stone Sentencing, 2020, War Powers
itunes:title: Roger Stone Sentencing, 2020, War Powers
description:
Panel guests: Sery Kim, Republican Strategist, former Senior Advisor in the Trump Administration and Attorney at Scheef and Stone and Roger Fisk, Democratic Strategist; long time President Obama aide and Principal of New Day Strategy.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
